explains: adj. 相互的，互惠的，报答的；（路线，方向）反向的；（代词，动词）互相的；（量，函数）倒数的
n. 反身代词，相互动词； 倒数，乘法逆元素；互相起作用的事物
wordGroup: reciprocal transformation 相互转化；反向变换；倒数转换
reciprocal action 互相酌；相互酌；交互作用

sentences.en: They expected a reciprocal gesture before more hostages could be freed.
sentences.cn: 他们期望在更多的人质被释放之前有互惠的表示。

sentences.en: The two colleges have a reciprocal arrangement whereby students from one college can attend classes at the other.
sentences.cn: 两所学院有一项互惠协定，允许学生在院际间选课。

sentences.en: The result indicates that there are reciprocal connections between the parabrachial nucleus and caudal portion of the dorsal vagal complex.
sentences.cn: 结果说明臂旁核和迷走神经背核簇尾侧部之间有交互联系。
